DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize ultrasound-guided supraclavicular interscalene block provide similar analgesia shoulder surgery .
DOC.detailed_description: Interscalene block provide effective postoperative analgesia shoulder surgery . However , associate significant risk include phrenic nerve palsy . Previous study report ultrasound-guided interscalene supraclavicular block effective safe shoulder arthroscopy .
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists physical status IIII inpatient undergo shoulder surgery pregnancy , severe respiratory disease , preexist neuropathy operate arm , coagulopathy , allergy study medication
